description:
This data is about the **Energy produced by the all energy producing plants**.The  numeric data are available in this dataset which gives the information about the Energyproduction . The columns are

===================================================================
- - index	
- - Date	
- - Region	
- - Thermal Generation Actual (in MU)	
- - Thermal Generation Estimated (in MU)	
- - Nuclear Generation Actual (in MU)	
- - Nuclear Generation Estimated (in MU)	
- - Hydro Generation Actual (in MU)	
- - Hydro Generation Estimated (in MU)	
- - Total Actual Production

====================================================================
title: Energy_production
